title: Monsieur Lazhar
writer: Philippe Falardeau (screenplay), Evelyne de la Chenelière (play)
actors: Mohamed Fellag, Sophie Nélisse, Émilien Néron, Marie-Ève Beauregard
plot: At a Montréal public grade school, an Algerian immigrant is hired to replace a popular teacher who committed suicide in her classroom. While helping his students deal with their grief, his own recent loss is revealed.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 30 wins & 12 nominations.
